name: Vegan Cookie Dough Blizzard Milkshake. Glutenfree Recipe
description: Amazing Vegan Cookie Dough Blizzard! No Bake gluten-free Chocolate chip Cookie dough blended w/ almond milk, dates and vanilla. Vegan Soy-free Recipe. Can be nut-free
recipeIngredient: 5  soft dates (pitted or use other sweetener of choice)
1.5 cups almond milk ice cubes (or other non dairy milk)
1/2 cup almond milk or other non dairy milk
cookie dough rolled into small balls for serving

recipeInstructions.text: Freeze the almond milk in an ice cube tray for an hour or longer. Soak the dates for atleast 15 mins in hot water.
recipeInstructions.name: Freeze the almond milk in an ice cube tray for an hour or longer. Soak the dates for atleast 15 mins in hot water.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the ice cubes and pitted soaked dates to a blender. Add the rest of the ingredients and blend until smooth and creamy. The chocolate chips will break up into tiny pieces that make the shake look chunky. You can blend further to combine or serve as is with the tiny chocolate chunks.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the ice cubes and pitted soaked dates to a blender. Add the rest of the ingredients and blend until smooth and creamy. The chocolate chips will break up into tiny pieces that make the shake look chunky. You can blend further to combine or serve as is with the tiny chocolate chunks.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour into a glass. Add cookie dough balls on top and serve!
recipeInstructions.name: Pour into a glass. Add cookie dough balls on top and serve!
